distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for python-uamqp fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-27099: Fixed potential double-free in link_frame_received() (bsc#1220535).

Bug fixes:

- Fixed compatibility with OpenSSL 3.x (bsc#1217782)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: The uAMQP is a C library for AMQP 1.0 communication to Azure Cloud Services. When processing an incorrect `AMQP_VALUE` failed state, may cause a double free problem. This may cause a RCE. Update submodule with commit 2ca42b6e4e098af2d17e487814a91d05f6ae4987.
notes.title: CVE description
